Note: Newer ESP32 variants (C6, H2, P4, etc.) already use ESP-IDF by default.

Why change? ESP-IDF offers:
  ✨ Up to 40% smaller binaries
  🚀 Better performance and optimization
  ⚡ 2-3x faster compile times
  📦 Custom-built firm
